description:
Enable you to set a monthly spend budget and be alerted via email when this is exceeded,
        based on either actual or forecasted spend. These emails include links to AnalysisSnapshots, which are
        generated automatically by us.

period.description: What period is the budget set for, currently only monthly is supported.

type.description:
Whether alerts should be triggered when the actual cost exceeds the monthly budget, or when
            we forecast the costs going over the monthly budget based on the average daily-cost of the current month.

frequency.description: The intervals at which alerts should be sent, emails will be sent at most once a day, week or month.

additional_emails.description: In addition to your email, the report will be sent to these additional email addresses.

attach_csv.description: Whether the emails should include a CSV attachement of the instance data.

filters.description: Filters to use for the BudgetAlert.

bad_request.description: The request cannot be fulfilled due to bad syntax.

json.body:
{
  "id": 631,
  "href": "/api/budget_alerts/631",
  "kind": "ca#budget_alert",
  "name": "My budget alert",
  "budget": {
    "amount": 0.0,
    "period": "monthly"
  },
  "type": "forecast",
  "frequency": "monthly",
  "additional_emails": [
    "john.smith@example.com",
    "joe.bloggs@example.org"
  ],
  "attach_csv": false,
  "filters": [
    {
      "kind": "ca#filter",
      "type": "instance:account_id",
      "value": "Amazon Web Services",
      "label": "Example Deployment (Test Account)",
      "tag_resource_type": "instances"
    },
    {
      "kind": "ca#filter",
      "type": "cloud_bill:product",
      "value": "Amazon Web Services",
      "label": "Example Deployment (Test Account)",
      "tag_resource_type": "accounts"
    },
    {
      "kind": "ca#filter",
      "type": "instance:instance_type_key",
      "value": "Amazon Web Services",
      "label": "Example Deployment (Test Account)",
      "tag_resource_type": "deployments"
    }
  ],
  "created_at": "2014-08-09T00:00:00+00:00",
  "updated_at": "2014-12-19T00:00:00+00:00"
}

bad_request.description: The request cannot be fulfilled due to bad syntax.
